name: Snake Eyes (Spicy Chicken, Pixel Overload, Robo-octo)
name_original: Snake Eyes (Spicy Chicken, Pixel Overload, Robo-octo)
description: As the noble green dice you will lead your fellow white dice through 12 stylish puzzles. Based in an era of booze, board games, and gambling the theme of this game well suits the theme for the 2022 GMTK game jam. You will roll your dice many times and in some levels many dice, bring your dice chain victory by matching the numbers on your dice faces to those on the victory tiles.
